cause.description:
The Smithsonian is the largest network of museums in the country if not the world and it covers topics ranging from art, to history, to science. If we hope to achieve a cultured society with a will to seek education then the advancement of this museum and others like it is essential.
1. Purchase more pieces of visual art from around the country
2. Increase funds for field trips to visit the Smithsonian Museums to schools in the United States and Abroad
3. Rehuvinate the traveling Smithsonian and increase the amount of tour stops.
4. Provide freeSmithsonian Magazine issues or reduced price issues to schools around the contru
cause.mission: Promote the funding and marketing of the Smithsonian Institute.
cause.name: Smithsonian Museum
